alert.note: Alert for Barton; Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 5:46PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Russell and northeastern Barton Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 546 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northeast of Hoisington, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wilson and Dorrance. This includes Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 200 and 205. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
